reviewtext: This slim case will give your palm quite an elegant touch. It is also lightweight and compact, and it will store your Palm, as well as some business cards and/or credit cards. I personally preffer the hard cover,  which has a more modern look and protects the Palm better. Nonetheless, I  use the slim leather case when I go to elegant social events because it is  slimmer and less heavy, so it is easier to carry in your coat pocket.
